snippet: Louie Gohmert, the Texas Republican challenging John A. Boehner for speaker of the House, doesn’t talk like the G.O.P. leadership.
abstract: Louie Gohmert, the Texas Republican challenging John A. Boehner for speaker of the House, doesn’t talk like the G.O.P. leadership.
